description: This file provides a minimal API client with functions for making HTTP requests with enforced timeouts, retries on transient errors, and specific handling for chat message posting. It primarily exposes two functions: 'fetchWithTimeout' and 'postChat', ensuring robust network communication with timeout management and error handling.

methods.name: fetchWithTimeout(url, options = {}, timeoutMs = DEFAULT_TIMEOUT_MS)
methods.description: Performs an HTTP fetch with a timeout using AbortController; retries once for transient errors such as timeouts and server errors.

methods.name: postChat(baseUrl, payload, timeoutMs = DEFAULT_TIMEOUT_MS)
methods.description: Posts chat messages to a specified backend URL with enforced timeout, relying on fetchWithTimeout.

ctags.name: fetchWithTimeout
ctags.pattern: /^export async function fetchWithTimeout(url, options = {}, timeoutMs = DEFAULT_TIMEOUT_MS) {$/

ctags.name: postChat
ctags.pattern: /^export async function postChat(baseUrl, payload, timeoutMs = DEFAULT_TIMEOUT_MS) {$/
